description: CSS file for managing themes and styles for a React application, specifically for the App component in a Tic Tac Toe frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, applying primary background color and text color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, centered and responsive, with dynamic background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application, responsive in size with spinning animation for visual effect.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Stylized link element within the app, changing color with transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button to toggle between light and dark themes, styled with effects for hover and active states.
